summary: This document is an email or correspondence header referencing a news story about Jeffrey Epstein's former cellmate, an ex-cop, who claims to have saved Epstein from a suicide attempt by hanging while they were incarcerated together at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The multimillionaire sex offender who was reportedly saved from a hanging attempt by his ex-cop cellmate while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: News report on Epstein's cellmate saving him
events.description: A news story is reported about Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate claiming to have saved Epstein from a hanging attempt while they were cellmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's former cellmate was an ex-cop.
The ex-cop cellmate claims to have saved Epstein from a suicide attempt by hanging while they were incarcerated together.
The incident reportedly occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
This information was reported in a news story on July 27, 2019.
